name: WhaleGameOnline
description:
Can You Make a Whale🐋?


This is a fun and charming game where you connect adorable sea creatures and help them grow bigger.
When you match creatures of the same type, they progressively get larger.
The more you nurture them, the higher your score will rise, so keep growing them.

Single Player and Multiplayer Modes!


There are both a single-player mode for focused play and a multiplayer mode for competing with friends and rivals from around the world.
In single player, you can focus on the growth of your sea creatures.
In multiplayer, you can enjoy strategic battles with opponents while competing in the growth of your sea friends.

You can also compete for high scores on the game's leaderboard. Engage in multiplayer battles and climb the score rankings to challenge rivals from all over the world.
